Package com.facetec.sdk

Class FaceTecCustomization

java.lang.Object
com.facetec.sdk.FaceTecCustomization
public final class FaceTecCustomization extends Object
Class used to customize the look and feel of the FaceTec interface. FaceTec SDK ships with a default theme but has a variety of variables that you can use to configure to your application's needs.
To customize the User Interface, simply create an instance of FaceTecCustomization and set some, or all, of the variables.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static int
    activityThemeId
     
    int
    exitAnimationSuccessResourceID
    Set this variable to a R.anim file to customize the transition out animation for a successful session.
    Default is -1.
    int
    exitAnimationUnsuccessResourceID
    Set this variable to a R.anim file to customize the transition out animation for an unsuccessful session.
    Setting this to 0 will disable the animation.
    Default is -1.
    FaceTecSecurityWatermarkImage
    securityWatermarkImage
    Customize the FaceTec Security Watermark Image by selecting from 1 of the 3 available FaceTec watermarks.
    FaceTecVocalGuidanceCustomization
    vocalGuidanceCustomization
    Customize FaceTec Vocal Guidance feature like settings run mode or providing sound files.

    • exitAnimationSuccessResourceID

      public int exitAnimationSuccessResourceID
      Set this variable to a R.anim file to customize the transition out animation for a successful session.
      Default is -1.

    • exitAnimationUnsuccessResourceID

      public int exitAnimationUnsuccessResourceID
      Set this variable to a R.anim file to customize the transition out animation for an unsuccessful session.
      Setting this to 0 will disable the animation.
      Default is -1.

    • activityThemeId

      public static int activityThemeId

    • securityWatermarkImage

      public FaceTecSecurityWatermarkImage securityWatermarkImage
      Customize the FaceTec Security Watermark Image by selecting from 1 of the 3 available FaceTec watermarks. Default is FaceTecSecurityWatermarkImage.FACETEC_ZOOM.

    • vocalGuidanceCustomization

      @NonNull public FaceTecVocalGuidanceCustomization vocalGuidanceCustomization
